archimate:BusinessObject.name: Qualified Electronic Signature (QES)
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: While different levels of electronic signatures may be appropriate in different contexts, only qualified electronic signatures are explicitly recognized to have the equivalent legal effect of hand-written signatures all over the EU.

properties.value: While different levels of electronic signatures may be appropriate in different contexts, only qualified electronic signatures are explicitly recognized to have the equivalent legal effect of hand-written signatures all over the EU.
A qualified electronic signature (eIDAS Article 3) is an advanced electronic signature which is additionally:
